# Form of the Dragon II (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] ([[Polymorph Spells|polymorph]])

**Level:** [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a scale of the dragon type you plan to assume)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Save:** See below

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 286

This spell functions as *[[Form of the Dragon I (Spell)|form of the dragon I]]* except that it also allows you to assume the form of a Large chromatic or metallic dragon. You gain the following abilities: a +6 size bonus to Strength, a +4 size bonus to Constitution, a +6 natural armor bonus, fly 90 feet (poor), darkvision 60 feet, a breath weapon, DR 5/magic, and resistance to one element. You also gain one bite (2d6), two claws (1d8), two wing attacks (1d6), and one tail slap attack (1d8). You can only use the breath weapon twice per casting of this spell, and you must wait 1d4 rounds between uses. All breath weapons deal 8d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage. Line breath weapons increase to 80-foot lines and cones increase to 40-foot cones.
